product_name: Thule Vertex Swing 4 Bike Hitch Rack
long_description: The new arc design of the Thule Vertex Swing 4 bike hitch rack securely carries up to 4 bikes and offers greater distance between bikes and better ground clearance than previous Thule hitch racks. Swing-away design allows a fully loaded hitch rack to swing away from vehicle providing access to rear of vehicle. Tilt-down design with Hitch Switch(TM) quick-release lever allows arms to fold down when not in use. Increased mast height improves ground clearance and arc design in mast and arms offers easy bike loading and carrying. New Hold Fast Cradles are shaped to cushion bike frames and provide security. Anti-Sway Cages with reinforced rubber straps prevent bike-to-bike and bike-to-vehicle contact. Snug-Tite(TM) receiver lock (sold separately) locks your rack to the car receiver. Thule Vertex Swing 4 accommodates 2 in. receiver hitches. Not intended for tandem or recumbent bikes. Not intended for tandem or recumbent bikes; carrying bikes with step-through frames requires the purchase of an adapter (sold separately).
short_description: The new arc design of the Thule Vertex Swing 4 bike hitch rack securely carries up to 4 bikes and offers greater distance between bikes and better ground clearance than previous Thule hitch racks.
